controlMappings.rationale: Semgrep detects input validation flaws through pattern matching and taint analysis
controlMappings.evidence: Detects SQL injection, XSS, command injection, path traversal vulnerabilities

controlMappings.rationale: Semgrep identifies error handling issues and information disclosure through code patterns
controlMappings.evidence: Rules for detecting verbose error messages, stack trace exposure

controlMappings.rationale: Semgrep can detect broken access control patterns in application code
controlMappings.evidence: Detects missing authorization checks, insecure direct object references

controlMappings.rationale: Semgrep identifies hardcoded credentials and weak cryptography usage
controlMappings.evidence: Detects weak encryption algorithms, hardcoded passwords
